dot means (.) TPB wont let me do a web address

Your work is much appreciated but what i was trying to say in your other torrents comment section was that it does no good to upload 10 different games if none of them ever finish downloading. If you've got the bandwidth for it, great.  But i can see that your first upload still has only one seeder.  If i was you i'd stop seeding red faction, portal 2, and dead space 2.  Those games already have well-seeded torrents here on tpb anyway.
Hope i'm not sounding like a dick. Just trying to help.  Thx again for your efforts.
please seed this game. I will help seed after downloading! thanx

and ive been keeping a close eye on my torrent's on utorrent and some have had up to 4 people seeding but within the next hour it's just back to me.
so i must say it dosnt help when other's wont help.
but thank you for you're feedback and i will get rid of red faction and the other's you said.
